EmailTemplate.description: Used to inform transportation team that an auction using ACV transport has been unwound.
EmailTemplate.name: Unwound ACV Transport
EmailTemplate.subject: Unwound Auction w/ Transport: Auction #{!Case.Auction_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Please be advised that auction ID {!Case.Auction_Number__c} has been unwound. Records indicate that ACV Transportation was requested on this auction.
Please review the auction's related transport case to arrive at an appropriate resolution for this job (cancellation, reassignment, expedition, etc.).
Unwind case link, which will bring you to auction and transport case: {!Case.Link}
Thank you!
